--------------------
Text: "The Frost King" was a short story about King Jack Frost written by 11-year-old Helen Keller.

Triplets:<The Frost King
2:
--------------------
Text: The Frost King:  Keller wrote a story about how a cask of jewels, being transported by fairy servants, had melted in the sun and covered the leaves.
Triplets:<The Frost King
3:
--------------------
Text: The Frost King:  As a birthday gift, Keller sent the story to Michael Anagnos, head of the Perkins School for the Blind, who published the story in "The Mentor," the Perkins alumni magazine.
Triplets:<Michael Anagnos
